Call every month to check schedule", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mmcc.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3450 Dekalb Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10467", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.881931, "longitude": -73.880493}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 882-4000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
